snippet.title: Hyperdrive Inn [OFFICIAL TRAILER]
snippet.description:
Get the game: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2561260/Hyperdrive_Inn/

Embark on a point & click adventure set in an infinite hotel on the edge of collapse!

The ever-growing accommodation behemoth known as Hyperdrive Inn is your father’s creation, and he is also responsible for triggering a set of cataclysmic events that threaten to destroy everything in existence.

He also happens to be the only person in the universe who can fix everything. Too bad he has gone missing. What’s even worse: he went hiding somewhere in the infinite hotel of his. And to top it all off, you’re the one who must hunt him down and save the day.

The infinite hotel of Hyperdrive Inn is filled with weird visitors (and inhabitants), outlandish environments and brain-twisting puzzles. You’ll never know what you find, who you meet and where you end up.

Hyperdrive Inn is full of surprises, and who says you can’t have fun while the world is coming to an end? After all, there are only two things that are infinite: the hotel and human stupidity.

Featuring plenty of oddball humor in the vein of those good old LucasArts titles, the world of Hyperdrive Inn is filled with references to popular culture and classic adventure games. It’s like living your childhood again but trapped inside an ever-shifting monster that some people call a hotel. Who wouldn’t like that!
